query: UPDATE liveLocations SET isRiding = false WHERE isRiding = true AND updatedAt < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute UPDATE liveLocations SET isRiding = false WHERE isRiding = true AND updatedAt < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE);
